name: Space the Music
description:
*Possible seizure warning*

Get rid of aliens in this space invader styled game! 

This was a Collab with @art axolotl who made the sprites!

Controls-

-Arrow keys to move

-Either hold or click space to shoot.

Background info-

You are recruited to fight aliens, and destroy their planet. If some get past you ,don't worry, your backup will get em'.

Other info-

-Download will be less laggy.

Hints-

-Maybe try to find a way to not kill them...
